by_created_at.map: function(doc) { var date = new Date(doc.created_at); if (date != "Invalid Date") emit(date, doc); }

by_created_at_and_source.map: function(doc) { var date = new Date(doc.created_at); if (date != "Invalid Date" && doc.source) emit([date, doc.source], doc); }

by_created_at_and_sentiment_score.map: function(doc) { var date = new Date(doc.created_at); var bucket = null; if (doc.sentiment_score >= 0 && doc.sentiment_score < 0.4) bucket = '0-0.4'; else if (doc.sentiment_score >= 0.4 && doc.sentiment_score < 0.6) bucket = '0.4-0.6'; else if (doc.sentiment_score >= 0.6 && doc.sentiment_score < 0.8) bucket = '0.6-0.8'; else if (doc.sentiment_score >= 0.8 && doc.sentiment_score <= 1) bucket = '0.8-1'; if (date != 'Invalid Date' && bucket != null) emit([date.toISOString(), bucket], null); }

by_gccsa_and_homeless_counts.map: function(doc) { if(doc[' gccsa_code'] && doc[' gccsa_name'] && doc.homeless_m_tot && doc.homeless_f_total && doc.homeless_total) emit([doc[' gccsa_code'], doc[' gccsa_name'], doc.homeless_m_tot, doc.homeless_f_total, doc.homeless_total], null); }

by_sa4_and_homeless_counts.map: function(doc) { if(doc[' sa4_code16'] && doc[' sa4_name_2016'] && doc.homeless_total) emit([doc[' sa4_code16'], doc[' sa4_name_2016'], doc.homeless_total], null); }

by_sa4_and_weekly_income.map: function(doc) { if(doc.sa4_code_2021 && doc[' median_tot_fam_inc_weekly'] && doc[' median_tot_prsnl_inc_weekly']) emit([doc.sa4_code_2021, doc[' median_tot_fam_inc_weekly'], doc[' median_tot_prsnl_inc_weekly']], null); }
